page.title: 03WEST FELTON CLUBS
page.content: CONSIDERING ITS SIZE WEST FELTON HAS A GOOD NUMBER OF VERY THRIVING CLUBS AND ORGANISATIONS.THE FELTONIAN CLUB FOR ELDERLY PEOPLE MEETS EVERY TUESDAY IN THE CHAPEL,IS VERY WELL ATTENDED AND ORGANISES OUTINGS AND AN ANNUAL DINNER FOR THE OLD PEOPLE OF THE VILLAGE.A BRANCH OF THE ROYAL BRITISH LEGION MEETS ON THE FIRST THURSDAY OF EACH MONTH AND HAS MEMBERS FROM THE SECOND WORLD WAR AS WELL AS SERVICEMEN WHO HAVE LEFT THE ARMED FORCES MORE RECENTLY.THE W.I. MEET ON THE SECOND THURSDAY OF EACH MONTH,WITH REGULAR SPEAKERS ENTERTAINING A LARGE NUMBER OF LADIES.THE YOUNGER MEMBERS OF THE VILLAGE ARE CATERED FOR WITH BROWNIES EVERY WEDNESDAY EVENING AND A YOUTH A CLUB HAS JUST BEEN RE-FORMED FOR THE TEENAGERS.ALSO THE BADMINTON CLUB AND THE BOWLING CLUB HAVE ENTHUSIATIC YOUNGSTERS AS WELL AS ADULTS.
